mapper.select: select info.content_id, info.latitude, info.longitude, detail.theme_code from attraction_detail detail left join attraction_info as info on detail.content_id=info.content_id left join attraction_description as description on detail.content_id=description.content_id left join bookmark as book on book.member_id=#{memberId} and detail.content_id = book.content_id where detail.theme_code =#{themeCode} and detail.category_code= #{categoryCode} and info.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%');

select info.content_id, info.title, info.latitude, info.longitude, info.addr1, info.first_image, description.overview, book.id bookmarkId from attraction_detail detail left join attraction_info as info on detail.content_id=info.content_id left join attraction_description as description on detail.content_id=description.content_id left join bookmark as book on book.member_id=#{memberId} and detail.content_id = book.content_id where info.content_id=#{contentId}
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where member_id=#{memberId} and content_id=#{contentId};
mapper.select: select info.content_id, info.title, info.first_image, info.addr1, info.latitude, info.longitude, t.theme_name, description.overView from attraction_info info join attraction_detail detail on info.content_id = detail.content_id join attraction_description description on info.content_id = description.content_id join theme t on t.theme_code = detail.theme_code where sido_code=#{sidoCode};

select info.content_id, info.title, info.first_image, info.addr1, info.latitude, info.longitude, t.theme_name, description.overView from attraction_info info join attraction_detail detail on info.content_id = detail.content_id join attraction_description description on info.content_id = description.content_id join theme t on t.theme_code = detail.theme_code join bookmark b on b.content_id = info.content_id where b.member_id=#{memberId};
